featured.text: Besides these 29 issues, bottled water has other disadvantages.
28 the information on storage and shipment is not always readily available to consumers, bottled water may not be a better alternative to tap water.
An estimated 2.5 million tons of carbon dioxide were generated in 2006 by the production of plastic for bottled water.
In addition, bottled water produces an incredible amount of solid 30 .
Bottled water is mostly sold in plastic bottles and that’s why it is potentially health 26 .

definition.zh_def: 裝瓶的，指液體被裝入瓶中以便儲存或銷售。
definition.en_def: Containing liquid that has been put into a bottle for storage or sale.
definition.example: She bought a bottled drink from the store.
